ygData.subject: RE: Did ya hear this???
ygData.msgSnippet: Spell is Summon Corpse, Necro only, level 29. Reagent costs some 200 plat and is unknown where to get it as of yet. The spell itself comes from a necro mob in
ygData.messageBody:
Spell is Summon Corpse, Necro only, level 29. Reagent costs some 200 plat
and is unknown where to get it as of yet. The spell itself comes from a
necro mob in Paws. Since the Rosch seem to be the casters this means it
either comes from the Named Rosch in the back or the dreaded Ishva Mal whose
guards are red to me at 35.

Good Journey

Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Monday, December 13, 1999 3:57 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Did ya hear this???


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

There is a Summon Corpse spell. Your corpse can be pulled from anywhere in
the current zone to the feet of the caster (necro I believe.) Also rumored
to require a reagent (black enameled coffin???) not yet located on mobs or
vendors.

Any info?

Sylly

p.s. saw a post and person asked what mob in Paw dropped this spell. Not
sure if he meant spell or the reagent.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
